thread.title: tina

author: tina
title: tina
text: brilliant company, was reccommended and so glad i was! i ordered my blinds as my recess size and they emailed through the process of them being made and despatched, they arrived packaged well and not over packaged which was great, but well protected, every single blind fit like a glove and had the perfct hang and the action of the blinds is so smooth and top quality at such a great price, do not hesitate to use this company they are excellent.
